messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI-TrashNodes-DownloadHuggingface node
The ComfyUI-TrashNodes-DownloadHuggingface node facilitates the download of models trained and uploaded to Hugging Face.
It simplifies the download process for models trained on Google Colab and uploaded to Hugging Face.
What is the advantage of using ComfyUI-TrashNodes-DownloadHuggingface over other methods of downloading models?
It simplifies the workflow and makes download quicker and easier for users who frequently train and deploy models.
